H0.text: Which 18th century polymath invented the lightning rod, the flexible urinary catheter, and coined the phrase 'time is money'. Benjamin Franklin

H1.text: Which 18th century polymath invented the lightning rod, the flexible urinary catheter, and coined the phrase 'time is money'. Leonardo da Vinci

H2.text: Which 18th century polymath invented the lightning rod, the flexible urinary catheter, and coined the phrase 'time is money'. Antoine Lavoisier

H3.text: Which 18th century polymath invented the lightning rod, the flexible urinary catheter, and coined the phrase 'time is money'. Franklinic

A4.text: Franklin was a prodigious inventor. Among his many creations were the lightning rod, Franklin stove, bifocal glasses and the flexible urinary catheter.
